post:
Impact VPS is the product of Subnet Labs LLC, a rapidly expanding and high-performance web hosting company based in Mechanicsburg, PA.

Hardware: We use the latest hardware for our KVM VPS nodes. Dual Intel Silver processors with 384GB DDR RAM, NVMe SSDs including separate a 10Gbps public and private uplinks.

After our recent public beta, we went hard at work correcting any issues that were found and we are now happy to share the finished product with you. (Beta discount also increased to 55% off)

Features:

  • NVMe SSD
  • Modern Kernels
  • IPv4 and IPv6 /64 subnet
  • IPv4 and IPv6 RDNS
  • 10Gbps public and private uplinks (internal networking is included)
  • Virtualizor panel

Cheaper Plans:

KVM2:

  • 2 Cores
  • 2 GB RAM
  • 30GB SSD
  • 2TB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • Internal IP
  • Seattle, WA

Cost: $3.50 per month (with the 50% discount)
Order: HERE

KVM4:

  • 2 Cores
  • 4 GB RAM
  • 60GB SSD
  • 4TB Bandwidth
  • 1 IPv4
  • /64 IPv6
  • Internal IP
  • Seattle, WA

Cost: $7.00 per month (with the 50% discount)
Order: HERE

Promocode: SSDKVMLAUNCH

Larger packages: http://subnetlabs.com/billing/cart.php?gid=14

We are so confident that you will love our services that we offer a 3 day no questions asked refund on the first payment of each account.

AUP: (This is not a comprehensive list): Not allowed: Teamspeak, mumble, torrents, spamming / mass mail, tor.
